post.author: ratty redemption
post.body: this is the 2nd time I haven`t been able to view page 3 of my d3 hell map topic, is this something my end or happening to other people here?

post.author: modern
post.body: I get a blank page, with just the header on page 3. Strange.

post.author: Black Dog
post.body: Same here. Start a copy thread?

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body:
ok, at least we`re getting the same, and the last post I could see before the blank page was blackdog offering to show me how he`d do the uv seams, did anyone see my reply to him? because I still have the notepad copy of it which I typed it in before copying into the forum. so I can post it again if need be.

what is a copy thread?

post.author: Black Dog
post.body: Just a new thread starting with your last post, having a suitably descriptive name.

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body: understood and I`ll do that after this post.

post.author: BNA!
post.body: Sorry for the annoyance - don't know how and why these things happen to some threads.

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body:
thanks bna and it hasn`t been too disruptive.

could it be because of us linking to sites like imageshack that my original thread has got corrupted?

and is there a way that you or kat could combine my two threads into one?

don`t worry if you can`t, as we can continue in the new one and link to the first 2 pages of the original if need be.

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
ratty redemption wrote:
could it be because of us linking to sites like imageshack that my original thread has got corrupted?


No, imageshack links are harmless.

post.author: ratty redemption
post.body: cool
